name: Statikk Shiv

passives.name: Electrospark
passives.effects: Your next 3 basic attacks {{tip|on-hit}} within 8 seconds are empowered to deal {{as|60 '''bonus''' magic damage}}, increased to {{as|85|magic damage}} against non-champions. This bounces to the closest target within 500 units, repeating from the new target to strike up to 5 targets ({{pp|25 to 10 for 6|1;8 to 12}} second cooldown, starts after using the first empowered attack).

passives.name: Electroshock
passives.effects: Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them resets ''Electrospark's'' cooldown.

effects_structured.raw: Your next 3 basic attacks {{tip on-hit}} within 8 seconds are empowered to deal {{as 60 '''bonus''' magic damage}}, increased to {{as 85 magic damage}} against non-champions

This bounces to the closest target within 500 units, repeating from the new target to strike up to 5 targets ({{pp 25 to 10 for 6 1;8 to 12}} second cooldown, starts after using the first empowered attack).
Scoring a {{tip takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them resets ''Electrospark's'' cooldown.

simpleDescription: Movement builds charges that release chain lightning on basic attack

schema_notes.effects_structured: Parsed from passive/active text for simulation use.
